Title: Provides that absentee ballots for all elections shall be made available in Braille, upon request of a blind or visually impaired voter
Summary: Provides that absentee ballots for all elections shall be made available in Braille and large print, upon request of a blind or visually impaired voter no less than 30 days prior to each election day.
LawCode: Add ยง7-107, El L; add ยง2022-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the education law, in relation to making absentee ballots available in Braille and large-print
